Насладитесь умными головоломками, которые заставят оживить серые клетки и репликами GLaDOS, наделенного сарказмом. В Portal 2 есть немало напряженных сцен, где надо брать ноги в руки и бежать. Так же есть кооперативный режим, в котором игроки могут сыграть в роли 2-х прикольных симпатяг-роботов, которых я очень люблю, Атласа и Пи-Боди, созданных GLaDOS.
Macht Spaß und ist auf jeden Fall geistreicher als irgendwelche Egoshooter.

This is a puzzle game like no other. Portal 2 puts you in the hands of a girl-I mean test subject named Chel and with your trustee Dual Portal Gun you traverse through 9 Chapters to discover the secrets of Aperture and to make your way to the thrilling final battle. The puzzles make you think and perform tricks you might not even know that were possible by using various things to proceed. Such things include: Lasers, Cubes, Buttons, various gels, Light Bridges, and more. Plus once you complete the main story you can try your luck with the multiplayer story. This doesn't have as much story as single player but the puzzles are better since you need 4 portals for all puzzles and there is comical dialouge throughout the 5 main courses. Portal 2 even has a Steam Workshop so you can create and download maps at your leisure. This game is near flawless. 9.5/10

Portal 2 is one of the best, brain-teasing, puzzle games I have ever played in my life! The dialogue always keeps stuff very funny still while keeping the serious atmosphere of the game. I would recommend this game to people with patience. Some of the areas may take a while for you to see what you have to do, however, it is still a great game and I would rate it a perfect 10/10! Well done, Valve!

Portal 2

10/10

Pros:
- Interesting story
- New puzzle elements
- Much longer than the original Portal
- Engaging co-op mode
- In-game level editor and more advanced Hammer Editor
- Steam Workshop support
- Wheatley

Cons:
- I'm grasping at straws here

An amazing improvement over the first game, Portal 2 is one of Valve's finest. Taking the original's already incredibly interesting gameplay, and adding not only more puzzle elements, but also a co-op mode, a level editor, and Workshop support to provide you with nearly endless puzzles make it amazing. A must have.

Want to mess around with physics ---- or even with your head?
Most certainly a mind boggler. How can I do this?
A 10 out of 10 for this one.

Matemática é pros fracos... os fortes jogam Portal 2! Uma maneira de se divertir ao mesmo tempo que exercita o cérebro! Jogue sozinho ou com um amigo, crie ou jogue novos mapas on-line, continue a história do primeiro jogo, e muito mais!!! Vale cada centavo.
BUY IT NOW!

An amazing game that is not only clever and challenging but also fun to play!

Atmospherically, the game is fantastic, set in a bleak and eerily empty post-apocolyptic factory complex, it keeps you entertained with little bits of dialogue from previous workers as well as frequent humourous interjections from the sassy GLaDOS, whose sarcastic remarks are incredibly quotable...

It is also worth noting that the co-op sections are extensive and incredibly fun, with almost limitless replayability thanks to Steam Workshop levels from other players.

The first game I ever bought on steam and a solid recommendation for anyone out there who enjoys a bit of a puzzle and some dry humour!
Ништяк игра

What can I say other than: "near flawless"? This game delivers, and I mean greatly, awesome dialouge, awesome characters, awesome puzzles, awesome gameplay, and awesome story all mashed up into a decently lengthy game with an amazing ending leaving you only wanting more. A must play if not a must own this game sets the bar for what gaming should be in some cases. 10/10

More Portals

A Valve geralmente faz jogos muito legais e criativos, sendo este um exemplo. A ideia de criar um jogo de quebra-cabeça com essa habilidade de criar portais é sensacional. É um dos games mais criativos já inventados.

O jogo começa como uma continuação do anterior. Começa com a Chell em um quarto dentro de uma espécie de container. GLaDOS, o robô malvado do jogo anterior, tenta novamente eliminá-la, colocando-a em seus experimentos, que certamente levam a morte. O objetivo é avançar os níveis criados utilizando os recursos disponíveis no cenário em combinação com a pistola de criar portais, bem básico.

Além do jogo principal ele conta com vários MoDs bem divertidos e um modo Co-op para se divertidar um coleguinha.
Amazing game. Funny, imaginative, clever, absolutely outstanding. Just make sure to play the first one before this. :)

Wer den ersten kennt, dann ist dieser Teil ein Muss! Spannend, teilweise sogar recht witzig (vor allem das Finale) und die Optik ist passend. Gut zu steuern, teilweise recht knifflige Rätsel und ein Editor für die Erstellung eigener Testräume! Was will der Portalfan mehr....

super divertido.

Portal 2 is one of the most played single player games that I own. You might think that that's a bit strange for a game with only a 10 hour campaign and maybe another 6 hours for the co-op campaign, but that is just the surface of this amazing game.

Prvotřídní hra, tak skvělě jsem se u hry už hodně dlouho nebavil. Hlavně GLaDOS a Wheatley to jsou skvosty, jedna skvělá hláška za druhou. Celkově je celý ten příběh a prostředí protkáno skvělým humorem. A co se týče hratelnosti jako takové, extratřída, spoustu nových originálních prvků a přitom základ stejný jako v jedničce(ten kdo nemá jedničku, tak asi nemusí správně pochopit příběh) a hlavně zakončit to tak aby na to nikdo nezapomněl. Jediné, co mě mrzí je, že singleplayer je hrozně krátký, ale nahrazuje to Co-op a komunitní mapy. U mě 9 z 10(dejte si o jeden bodík navíc, pokud to máte s kým hrát). Bravo Valve!

Portal 2 was the AMAZING squeal to an already amazing game. while portal one seemed more like an excremental game, Portal 2 feels like a full finished game with a rich and deep story line, memorable characters, confident game structure and so much more. the added Co-op campaign was a major delight which was new from the portal franchise. an amazing game all around that will have you bagging for a 3ed edition to the series. 20/10. well done valve. get this game. now!

One of the best games I have ever played. Combining an amazing story with challenging but not impossible puzzles creates one of the best gaming experiences of all time. Also add in amazing graphics, and stellar voice acting by Stephen Merchant and Ellen McLain. After you're finished with the story mode, play with you friends on two player co-op. It's so much fun fucking over your friends. Buy Portal and Portal 2 now.

Nachdem ich in windes Eile den ersten Teil durchgespielt habe und - wie der Zufall es will - der zweite Teil passend im Angebot war und mir somit ebenfalls zulegte, kann es weitergehen mit dem Geknobbel durch eine vergessene und marode Welt der Kammern, die man z.T. schon im ersten Teil sehen und bewundern konnte. Du spielst die selbe Person und machst direkt da weiter, wo der erste endete.... Naja fast, wären da nicht die etlichen Tage, Monate, Jahre Hyperschlaf! Hier braucht man wieder einmal nicht viel zu sagen, denn die Fortsetzung steht dem Vorgänger in nichts nach und als derben Bonus wird der vorhandene Spassfaktor hier mit einem KOOP erhöht, welcher wirklich gelungen ist. Deshalb volle 10/10 Portale für GlaDOS!!!

Oh, can I also just say that the music is somewhere in the top 3 of my favorite game soundtracks.

I'd say just go and buy it. It's dirt cheap on sale but it's worth a million.
